sentences.en: A ditch diverted water from the rill into the fields.
sentences.cn: 一条沟渠把水从河里引向田间.

sentences.en: A ditch diverted water from the stream into the fields.
sentences.cn: 一条沟把溪水引到田间.

sentences.en: Below the bridge we could just discern a narrow, weedy ditch.
sentences.cn: 我们仅能依稀辨出桥下一条杂草丛生的窄沟。

sentences.en: Both vehicles ended up in a ditch.
Gutters lead the water into the ditch.
sentences.cn: 排水沟把水排到这条水沟里.

sentences.en: I can't bring myself to ditch him and start again.
sentences.cn: 我不忍心蹬掉他再觅新欢。

sentences.en: If the blind leads the blind, both will fall into ditch.
sentences.cn: 盲人领瞎子, 两人都会掉进水沟里.

sentences.en: My headlights shone over a broad ditch of water.
sentences.cn: 我的汽车前灯照亮了一道很宽的水沟.

sentences.en: She underwent a heart transplant in a last-ditch attempt to save her.
sentences.cn: 她动了心脏移植手术，这是为挽救她的生命而作的最后一次努力。

sentences.en: The bicycle lay upended in a ditch.
sentences.cn: 自行车翻倒在一条小水沟里。

sentences.en: The car tipped into the ditch.
The carriage upset and we were all spilled into the ditch.
sentences.cn: 马车翻了,我们都摔到了沟里.

sentences.en: The government has ditched plans to privatise the prison.
sentences.cn: 政府放弃了监狱私有化的计划。

sentences.en: The horse hurdled both the fence and the ditch.
sentences.cn: 这马连篱笆和沟都跳过去了.

sentences.en: The water in the ditch is not very clean.
With the blind leading the blind, both shall fall into the ditch.
sentences.cn: 如果瞎子替瞎子带路的话, 那么两方肯定会掉到沟里.

words.tran_cn: 在…上掘沟；把…开入沟里；丢弃

trans.tran_en: a long narrow hole dug at the side of a field, road etc to hold or remove unwanted water
to stop having something because you no longer want it
